item.title: Suggested Edit: New Info straight from the Karma page in game.
item.content:encoded:
BillyClub Membership (30 day)

+100 Stamina per day
+5,000 Party House Ryo per day
+50% AP/JXP/Arena Rep
+20% Spiral Energy Creation
Season 1 players get an additional +50% AP/JXP/Arena Rep
Season 2+ players get +2 Juice Limit
One free BillyCon Entry per month
Advertisement Removal
10% Discount on Boosters and Booster 3-Packs
Skip the 4-Character CAPTCHA (if you want)
Get one free Loyalty Point Bonus Chip, and one each time you renew
'Unique' IP - never conflict with anyone
Access to the exclusive BillyClub Chat
Access to the exclusive BillyClub Forum
Access to bonus Festival Events/Raffle
Cannot go higher than 15 Days Idle
+50 Marketplace Views per day
Access to BillyClub Sketchbook, a constantly-updated repository of BvS concept art, sketches, and wallpapers
Interactive BillyClub Q & A with 11DBHK - ask questions, get answers
A special BillyClub Mark by their name throughout the site (optional)

item.title: Unclear description of 3-Pack Boosters
item.content:encoded:
Below the 3-Pack Boosters table, the following line appears.

3-Pack Boosters have three uses that last for a period of 3 days

This statement suggests that each of the three uses lasts for three days, resulting in a total of nine days of benefit. I believe the boosters in question only provide three days of benefit. It might be helpful to use the "3-Use" terminology from the BvS karma page.
